chunk: Tender lamb strips recipe hese tender pieces of lamb make easy-to-hold strips so your baby can explore the flavour and texture of meat. Age: 6 months or older Prep: 2 mins Cook: 15 mins Portions: 4 (approx) Ingredients - 1 lamb steak Method Preheat the grill on high setting. Grill the lamb for around 6 minutes on both sides until cooked through (no pink meat) and tender. Allow the lamb to cool, then remove any fat and cut into finger-length strips. Serve a quarter of the lamb strips as a finger food. Refrigerate any leftovers or use them in a meal or sandwich. You can freeze any remaining lamb steaks. You could try different meats such as chicken, pork or beef strips instead of lamb – try our lemony chicken strips recipe. Weaning tip Give your baby sips of water with their meals - rather than sweet drinks which can
title: Tender Lamb Strips
